dissect: analyse (a text or idea) in minute detail.
constituent*: being a part of a whole.
ascertain: find (something) out for certain; make sure of.
relationship*: the way in which two or more people or things are connected, or the state of being connected.
logic: the quality of being justifiable by reason.
pattern*: an arrangement or design regularly found in comparable objects.
differenc*: a point or way in which people or things are dissimilar
similarit*: having a resemblance in appearance, character, or quantity, without being identical
interpret*: explain the meaning of (information or actions).
consider*: think carefully about (something), typically before making a decision.
examin*: inspect (someone or something) thoroughly in order to determine their nature or condition
component*: a part or element of a larger whole, especially a part of a machine or vehicle.
feature*: a distinctive attribute or aspect of something.
structure*: the arrangement of and relations between the parts or elements of something complex
identif*: establish or indicate who or what (someone or something) is
